message.content:
### OpenAI's Latest Funding Round

**October 2024: $6.6 Billion Raised**
- **Investors**: Thrive Capital (led with ~$1B), Microsoft, Nvidia, SoftBank, Coatue, Altimeter Capital, and others (total 23 investors).
- **Valuation**: $157 billion post-money.
- **Details**: This was a major equity funding round, bringing OpenAI's total funding to over $13.8 billion. It supports scaling AI infrastructure amid high compute costs. No new governance changes or profit-sharing shifts were announced.
- **Status**: Completed and announced on October 2, 2024.

**Sources**:
- [OpenAI Official Blog: "OpenAI raises $6.6B"](https://openai.com/index/major-funding-announcement/)
- [TechCrunch: "OpenAI raises $6.6B at $157B valuation"](https://techcrunch.com/2024/10/02/openai-raises-6-6b-at-157b-valuation/)
- [Reuters: Confirmation and investor details](https://www.reuters.com/technology/artificial-intelligence/openai-closes-66-billion-funding-round-valuation-157-billion-2024-10-02/)

No newer rounds announced as of December 2024. For real-time updates, check OpenAI's site or Crunchbase.
